column3: was a nickname given to Aragorn by the people of Eriador (as for example at Bree) during his time as a Rangers of the North.

column1: The name seems to refer to the long legs of the Rangers
Though Aragorn considered the name scornful
column2: he took it as the name of his royal house: translated into Quenya as Telcontar.
Frodo Baggins jokingly named his pony "Strider (pony)" in order to honor his former companion.
